snapshot_info.narration_text: Pick up the butter from the countertop using the right hand.

zone_lower_shelf_of_the_door_of_the_frid.name: lower shelf of the door of the fridge

interaction_history.narration_text: stretch left hand inside cupboard to reach mug
flip the bottom part of the coffee machine so as to put the mug using the right hand in the right place under the nozzle of the coffee machine.
Put the mug that is in the right hand under the nozzle of the coffee machine.
stretch left hand inside cupboard lower shelf to reach mug
pull down the handle of the coffee machine to lock the coffee capsule
tilt up, place lid, rotate clockwise to close milk bottle
while the left hand is closing the milk bottle, the right hand presses the power button on the milk frother to start it on
Tilt the milk bottle up after the milk has been poured. Place the lid from the left hand on top of the milk bottle. Rotate clockwise to close the milk bottle.

interaction_history.action: tilt up, place lid, rotate clockwise
interaction_history.narration_text: Tilt the milk bottle up after the milk has been poured. Place the lid from the left hand on top of the milk bottle. Rotate clockwise to close the milk bottle.
press power button on milk frother
put down the milk bottle inside the fridge in the lower shelf of the door
press the button of the long coffee
turn the lid of the food processor counterclockwise to remove it from the bowl
feel through the flattened part of the roll to check where the breaking point is.
stretch left hand inside the cupboard to reach a mug
turn the mug in the left hand to face the camera so as to check how clean it is
flip bottom part of coffee machine to put mug
put the mug that is in the right hand under the nozzle of the coffee machine
put down second mug to the right of the sink
pull one bag out of the roll
Tilt the milk frother to pour the frothed milk from inside it into the mug which is being held using the left hand.
return the cone which is in the right hand inside the milk frother
flip the orange and place it on the cone of the juice presser
pick up second half of orange
flip the half of the orange and place it downwards on the cone of the juice processor
open the lid of the food recycling bin and remove the orange from the cone of the juicer
pick up second half of second orange
pick up half of the orange
place the half of the orange on the cone of the juicer facing downwards using the right hand
rotate back the half orange as some juice is still left, placing it on the cone of the juicer
move remaining content inside juicer bowl to get any remaining juice
rotate the bowl of the food processor counterclockwise to unlock it from the machine using both hands
throw the remaining content inside the juicer
open tap so water is running to rinse the juicer bowl
tilt water filter to pour water
place glass now filled with orange juice
put down the glass to the right of the sink using the right hand
place the glass under the tap nozzle and open the tap using the handle, the right handle with the right hand.
turn the glass upside down to empty the water inside it into the sink using the left hand.
turn the glass using the left hand to point upwards
rotate glass upside down to empty its contents into the sink
rotate bowl and place on drainer
place socket on lid of food processing bowl
pick up the kettle with the boiling water from its base using the right hand
pour water from the kettle into the second pan on the far side of the hob to fill it with hot water.
place the mug under the nozzle of the tap and open the tap from the right handle using the right hand to rinse it.
open both sides of the pasta box using both hands
close the flaps on top of the pasta box using both hands
pick up one fallen piece of pasta
pick up jar of black pepper
put down jar of black pepper
rotate the jar upside down and position it on top of the pan
grind and pour pepper from the jar into the pan
pour salt from the salt bottle into the pan filled with hot water
pick up plate filled with pasta, uncooked
open the packet of the butter
slice another slice of the butter
pick up one slice of butter
put the black pepper jar on the countertop next to the hob
open the lid of the black pepper jar
close the jar by placing the lid on top
hit the spatula on the rim of the pan to remove excess oil
move cheese block from left hand to right hand, keeping the grater in the left hand
position grater on plate and grate cheese
place cheese block inside the cheese package
Stir the content of the pan, which is the butter and the grated black pepper, using the spatula, stirring in circular motions.
mix the content of the pan
write updated weight after reweighing the grinded cheese
pick up plate filled with grinded cheese
slice another slice of butter from the packet
dip ladle in pan containing boiling water with pasta
pick up another handful of cheese
throw second handful of grated cheese
position plate to pour grated cheese
clap both hands twice to dust off any remaining cheese
pick up second slice of butter
close the cheese package by folding it
